payload.content: Claude Opus 4.6 and GPT-5.3 Codex, released within 18 minutes of each other, represent fundamentally different engineering philosophies: autonomous agents versus interactive collaboration.

name: Claude Opus 4.6 and GPT-5.3 Codex, released within 18 minutes of each other, rep
content: Claude Opus 4.6 and GPT-5.3 Codex, released within 18 minutes of each other, represent fundamentally different engineering philosophies: autonomous agents versus interactive collaboration.

payload.content: To properly use Opus 4.6, users must update Claude Code to version 2.1.32+, set the model in settings.json, and explicitly enable the experimental Agent Teams feature.

name: To properly use Opus 4.6, users must update Claude Code to version 2.1.32+, set
content: To properly use Opus 4.6, users must update Claude Code to version 2.1.32+, set the model in settings.json, and explicitly enable the experimental Agent Teams feature.

payload.content: Opus 4.6's standout feature is multi-agent orchestration, allowing users to spin up parallel agents for research, architecture, UX, and testing to work simultaneously.

name: Opus 4.6's standout feature is multi-agent orchestration, allowing users to spin
content: Opus 4.6's standout feature is multi-agent orchestration, allowing users to spin up parallel agents for research, architecture, UX, and testing to work simultaneously.

payload.content: GPT-5.3 Codex's standout feature is mid-task steering, enabling users to interrupt, redirect, and course-correct the model while it is actively building.

name: GPT-5.3 Codex's standout feature is mid-task steering, enabling users to interru
content: GPT-5.3 Codex's standout feature is mid-task steering, enabling users to interrupt, redirect, and course-correct the model while it is actively building.

payload.content: In a live head-to-head, Codex finished a Polymarket competitor in under 4 minutes, while Opus took significantly longer but produced a more polished UI, richer feature set, and 96 tests compared to Codex's 10.

name: In a live head-to-head, Codex finished a Polymarket competitor in under 4 minute
content: In a live head-to-head, Codex finished a Polymarket competitor in under 4 minutes, while Opus took significantly longer but produced a more polished UI, richer feature set, and 96 tests compared to Codex's 10.

payload.content: Agent teams in Opus 4.6 substantially multiply token usage, with a single build potentially consuming 150,000–250,000 tokens across all agents.

name: Agent teams in Opus 4.6 substantially multiply token usage, with a single build
content: Agent teams in Opus 4.6 substantially multiply token usage, with a single build potentially consuming 150,000–250,000 tokens across all agents.

payload.content: Developers using Opus 4.6 need to update via NPM, verify version 2.1.32+, set the model to Opus in settings.json, and enable the experimental Agent Teams flag by setting `claude_code_experimental_agent_teams` to one.

name: Developers using Opus 4.6 need to update via NPM, verify version 2.1.32+, set th
content: Developers using Opus 4.6 need to update via NPM, verify version 2.1.32+, set the model to Opus in settings.json, and enable the experimental Agent Teams flag by setting `claude_code_experimental_agent_teams` to one.

payload.content: Opus 4.6 offers a 1-million-token context window, strong architectural comprehension, and less tendency to write reckless code.

name: Opus 4.6 offers a 1-million-token context window, strong architectural comprehen
content: Opus 4.6 offers a 1-million-token context window, strong architectural comprehension, and less tendency to write reckless code.

payload.content: GPT-5.3 Codex has a roughly 200,000-token context window, excels on SWE-Bench Pro and coding benchmarks, and is strong in progressive execution and rapid iteration.

name: GPT-5.3 Codex has a roughly 200,000-token context window, excels on SWE-Bench Pr
content: GPT-5.3 Codex has a roughly 200,000-token context window, excels on SWE-Bench Pro and coding benchmarks, and is strong in progressive execution and rapid iteration.

payload.content: Claude (Opus 4.6) is like a senior staff engineer asking 'should we do this?', while GPT-5.3 (Codex) is like a founding engineer asking 'how fast can I ship this?'.

name: Claude (Opus 4.6) is like a senior staff engineer asking 'should we do this?', w
content: Claude (Opus 4.6) is like a senior staff engineer asking 'should we do this?', while GPT-5.3 (Codex) is like a founding engineer asking 'how fast can I ship this?'.

payload.content: When designing prompts for Opus 4.6, instruct it to build an agent team with specialists (e.g., architecture, prediction market domain, UX, testing). For Codex, give a parallel prompt asking it to think deeply about the same areas.

name: When designing prompts for Opus 4.6, instruct it to build an agent team with spe
content: When designing prompts for Opus 4.6, instruct it to build an agent team with specialists (e.g., architecture, prediction market domain, UX, testing). For Codex, give a parallel prompt asking it to think deeply about the same areas.

payload.content: Opus 4.6 excels when delegating whole chunks of work to autonomous agents for comprehensive results review.

name: Opus 4.6 excels when delegating whole chunks of work to autonomous agents for co
content: Opus 4.6 excels when delegating whole chunks of work to autonomous agents for comprehensive results review.

payload.content: Codex 5.3 excels as a fast, interactive collaborator that can be steered in real time.

name: Codex 5.3 excels as a fast, interactive collaborator that can be steered in real
content: Codex 5.3 excels as a fast, interactive collaborator that can be steered in real time.
